app.title: PPhoto
app.subtitle: Photo Printing Layout Tool
app.slogan: Smart Â· Efficient Â· Zero Waste â€”â€” Redefining your photo printing experience!
app.description: PPhoto is a simple and efficient photo printing layout tool that helps you quickly organize photos, create smart layouts, and print in multiple formats. No login required, completely free, can be used online or deployed locally.

features.title: Feature Highlights
features.pageDescription: Our photo printing layout tool offers a rich set of features to meet all your printing needs. From simple ID photos to complex album layouts, we've got you covered.

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Photo Formats
multipleFormats.description: Supports layouts for 1-inch, 2-inch, 5-inch, 6-inch, A4 and more

paperSizes.title: Variety of Paper Sizes
paperSizes.description: Supports 6-inch, A4, A5 and other common paper sizes with smart arrangement

pdfExport.title: Instant PDF Export
pdfExport.description: One-click export of high-quality PDF files, ready for printing

easyToUse.title: Minimal Learning Curve
easyToUse.description: Drag, preview, and adjust seamlessly with zero learning cost

templates.title: Template Library
templates.description: Various common layout templates that can be applied with one click for quick formatting

customization.title: Custom Settings
customization.description: Adjust photo margins, spacing, rotation and other parameters for complete control over layout

optimization.title: Smart Optimization
optimization.description: Automatically calculates the best arrangement to reduce paper waste

batchPrinting.title: Batch Printing
batchPrinting.description: Support multiple groups of photos for simultaneous layout and printing, improving work efficiency

preview.title: Real-time Preview
preview.description: WYSIWYG editing mode, check the final print effect at any time

crop.title: Smart Cropping
crop.description: Automatically crop photos according to selected dimensions to ensure correct proportions

finetuning.title: Fine Tuning
finetuning.description: Fine-tune photo position and size for perfect layout

save.title: Save Projects
save.description: Save editing projects to continue perfecting or reuse at any time

features.readyToTry: Ready to experience these powerful features?

about.pageDescription: A free photo printing layout tool designed for photography enthusiasts and ordinary users, helping you easily solve photo printing problems.

developerStory.title: Developer's Words
developerStory.paragraph1: Photo Printing Layout Tool (PPhoto) is a personal project I developed, stemming from my own frustrations when frequently needing to print photos. I found the market lacked a simple, free, and efficient tool to help ordinary people solve photo layout and printing problems.
developerStory.paragraph2: This project is built using Next.js and modern frontend technologies, runs entirely in the browser, and requires no software installation. All photo processing is done locally without uploading to any servers, ensuring your privacy.
developerStory.paragraph3: As an individual developer, I am committed to continuously improving this tool. If you have any suggestions or feedback, please feel free to contact me!

about.developerQuote: As a photography enthusiast and developer, I created this tool to solve practical problems I encountered. I hope it helps you too!

mission.title: Project Philosophy
mission.description: I believe good tools should be simple, practical, and free. The core philosophy of PPhoto is to help users save time and paper, making photo printing simple and enjoyable. Whether printing ID photos, memorial photos, or artwork, it can be easily accomplished.

feature1.title: Simple to Use
feature1.description: Intuitive interface design, no professional knowledge required, layout completed in minutes.

feature2.title: Flexible Layout
feature2.description: Support for various paper and photo sizes, automatically calculating the best arrangement.

feature3.title: Completely Free
feature3.description: All features completely free to use, no watermarks, no hidden charges.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is this tool free to use?
faq.a1: Yes, completely free. This is my personal project, aimed at helping people with photo printing needs.
faq.q2: Do I need to install any software?
faq.a2: No, use it directly in your browser without downloading or installing any software. Supports computers, tablets, and phones.
faq.q3: Will my photos be uploaded to servers?
faq.a3: No. All photo processing is done locally in your browser and will not be uploaded to any servers, ensuring your privacy.
faq.q4: How can I support this project?
faq.a4: You can support this project by sharing it with more people who need it, providing usage feedback, or following me on Xiaohongshu. If you're a developer, you're also welcome to contribute code on GitHub.

tutorials.pageDescription: Master all photo printing layout techniques from scratch through our step-by-step tutorials. Whether you're a beginner or a professional user, you'll find content suited for you.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to use the basic functions of the photo printing layout tool from scratch

photoPreparation.title: Photo Preparation
photoPreparation.description: Learn how to prepare photos in the best format and size for printing

basicLayout.title: Basic Layout
basicLayout.description: Learn how to arrange and organize photos for optimal printing results

idPhotos.title: ID Photo Creation
idPhotos.description: Master how to quickly generate and print ID photos of various specifications

groupPhotos.title: Batch Photo Processing
groupPhotos.description: How to process and print multiple photos of different sizes at once

templates.title: Using Templates
templates.description: Use preset templates to quickly complete common photo layout tasks

advancedLayout.title: Advanced Layout Techniques
advancedLayout.description: Explore more complex layout strategies to maximize paper utilization

customSettings.title: Custom Settings
customSettings.description: Dive deep into all customization options for professional-level printing effects

tutorials.requestTitle: Didn't find the tutorial you need?
tutorials.requestDescription: We're constantly adding new tutorial content. If you have specific needs, please let us know, and we'll consider adding them to our tutorial library.
